text: 2:3 Ua Me Ini 34:12; Godɨn Araziba 7:16; Josua 23:13; Onger Akaba 106:36Kamaghɨn, kɨ kamaghɨn ia mɨgei, ia men nguazibar aven mangɨ me batoghsɨ damuamin dughiamɨn, kɨ ian faragh mangɨghan kogham. Puvatɨ. Gumazir kaba ian apanibar otivigh azuazibar mɨn ian suigh ia damutɨ ia irɨ, egh tuavir voroghɨra itim ategham. Eghtɨ men aseba bar puvɨra ian nɨghnɨzir gavgaviba basamam, da gavgaviz o.”
